EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Cancellation Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__ContactBuying__c},
We have received your request to cancel your Five Star Professional order {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Name} placed on {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Release_Date__c}. At this time your order has been cancelled and all payments made on this order have been refunded.
If you reconsider and would like to utilize one of the packages available, please feel free to contact your Account Manager {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Salesperson__c} at 888-438-5782, option 3.
If you have any questions regarding this cancellation, please contact Five Star Professional billing department at (888) 608-7161.
Kind regards,
Accounts Receivable Five Star Professional Phone: (888) 608-7161 | Email: billing@fivestarprofessional.com
